item.title: Canal Ciência Project
item.description: A research project in partnership with IBICT and funded by FINATEC, aimed at enhancing the user experience of the Canal Ciência through the use of gamification.

item.title: Sergio Antônio Andrade de Freitas
item.description: Full Professor at the University of Brasília (UnB), working in the undergraduate Software Engineering program and the Graduate Program in Applied Computing.

item.title: CEDIS Participates in Gamification Project
item.description: Partnership between CEDIS and IBICT launches an innovative gamification project for the Canal Ciência portal
